perks.title: Pay for Treatment
perks.description: Heal to full. Cost: 1 Wire per 2% health restored. Must be able to afford the full amount.

perks.title: Field Triage
perks.description: Heal your two most-injured allies to full health for free.

perks.title: Fleet Footed
perks.description: Increase your movement speed by 10% for the next 3 ships.

perks.title: Repair Node Damaged by DroidSlayer
perks.description: Repair the upgrade node that was damaged by the DroidSlayer, allowing you to purchase it again.
